question: The National High Speed Rail Corporation Ltd. is going to adopt which survey technique for Delhi-Varanasi High Speed Rail Corridor?
explanation: The National High Speed Rail Corporation Ltd. is going toÂ adopt LiDAR Survey technique for Delhi-Varanasi High Speed Rail Corridor. LiDAR Survey technique was adopted for the first time for the Mumbai-Ahmedabad High Speed Rail Corridor because of its high accuracy.
